Key Match Events: Billy Cook gunned down a runner at the plate and scored from 1st on a single to center field in banner day
Cook prevented a run with a marvelous throw from right field
Cook broke out of an 0 for 11 skid with a base knock, which was just his third as a big leaguer
Pre-Game Insights: The Pirates honored Roberto Clemente Day, with the numerals '2' and '1' etched into the right-field grass at PNC Park
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Derek Shelton said, 'We’re growing the awareness of Clemente. That’s what’s really important.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played on Roberto Clemente Day, with the Pirates honoring the Hall of Famer
Oneil Cruz was replaced in center field by Michael A. Taylor in the top of the seventh inning due to left ankle discomfort
